basics.name: Carlos Luengo Vera
basics.summary: Sr. Account Executive focused on AI and digital transformation. Experienced in EdTech, cloud, and public sector innovation.

work.summary: Led AI and EdTech innovation initiatives for major publishing clients and educational institutions.
highlights: Developed AI framework for 15 publishers, reducing costs by 65%.
Drove AI Generative adoption among enterprise clients.
Led Skills to Jobs Tech Alliance to enhance national AI education.

work.summary: Managed datacenter partner strategies to boost sales performance.
Directed global digital innovation programs focused on AI, blockchain, and data monetization.
highlights: Implemented AI and blockchain solutions for 20+ clients.
Pioneered data tokenization and monetization in Spain and Chile.
Led strategic partnerships and innovation culture.

work.summary: Delivered scalable cloud solutions and guided clients in digital transformation.
highlights: Improved operational efficiency through tailored cloud architectures.

work.summary: Blended technical expertise with marketing to run high-impact IT campaigns.
highlights: Created user-centric technology strategies for broad adoption.

education.area: PhD in Economics and Artificial Intelligence
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer and Information Sciences

publications.name: Evaluating Large Language Models on the Spanish Medical Intern Resident (MIR) Examination 2024/2025
publications.summary: Comparative analysis of generative AI models in clinical reasoning and performance across the MIR 2024/2025 medical exams.

publications.name: Revisión bibliográfica de las herramientas de IA generativa aplicadas al aprendizaje de idiomas
publications.summary: A comprehensive review of generative AI tools used in language learning and their educational implications.

publications.name: Human-AI Alignment in Education: Lessons from Public Sector Use Cases
publications.summary: Explores alignment strategies for deploying AI responsibly in educational systems, grounded in real public sector applications.
